BasicEvent.Name: driver_switch.WireBroken
BasicEvent.Description: There is a loose wire connection or the wire has been damaged and no long sends commands

Effect.Name: Window Does Not Move on Request

BasicEvent.Name: driver_switch.ContactsBroken
BasicEvent.Description: The contacts have been no damaged and no long open and close the circuit as expected.

Effect.Name: Window Does Not Move on Request

BasicEvent.Name: driver_switch.InternalFailure
BasicEvent.Description: A failure has occured inside the switch to provide an unexpected value (no necessarily no value)

Effect.Name: Unintended Move of Window

BasicEvent.Name: passenger_switch.WireBroken
BasicEvent.Description: There is a loose wire connection or the wire has been damaged and no long sends commands

Effect.Name: Window Does Not Move on Request

BasicEvent.Name: passenger_switch.ContactsBroken
BasicEvent.Description: The contacts have been no damaged and no long open and close the circuit as expected.

Effect.Name: Window Does Not Move on Request

BasicEvent.Name: passenger_switch.InternalFailure
BasicEvent.Description: A failure has occured inside the switch to provide an unexpected value (no necessarily no value)

Effect.Name: Unintended Move of Window

BasicEvent.Name: power_window_control_system.control.ControllerFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The control system has a software internal failure.

Effect.Name: Unintended Move of Window

BasicEvent.Name: power_window_control_system.detect_obstacle_endstop.detect_endstop.SoftwareFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The control software failed to detect the end stop based on the current

Effect.Name: Window Did Not Stop on Fully Open or Close
Window Does Not Move on Request

BasicEvent.Name: power_window_control_system.detect_obstacle_endstop.detect_endstop.HardwareFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The hardware has produced a failure

Effect.Name: Window Did Not Stop on Fully Open or Close
Window Does Not Move on Request

BasicEvent.Name: power_window_control_system.detect_obstacle_endstop.detect_obstacle.SoftwareFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The control software failed to detect the object

Effect.Name: Pinch Detection Malfunction

BasicEvent.Name: power_window_control_system.detect_obstacle_endstop.detect_obstacle.HardwareFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The hardware has produced a failure in the system

Effect.Name: Pinch Detection Malfunction

BasicEvent.Name: power_window_control_system.validate_driver.HardwareFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The hardware has failed to validate the inputs and is providing an incorrect output.

Effect.Name: Unintended Move of Window

BasicEvent.Name: power_window_control_system.validate_passenger.HardwareFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The hardware has failed to validate the inputs and is providing an incorrect output.

Effect.Name: Unintended Move of Window

BasicEvent.Name: window_system.actuator.CurrentSensorFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The current sensor in the actuator has failed and is no longer providing a value.

Effect.Name: Pinch Detection Malfunction
Window Does Not Move on Request

BasicEvent.Name: window_system.actuator.BatteryFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The battery is no longer providing current to the motor.

Effect.Name: Pinch Detection Malfunction
Window Does Not Move on Request

BasicEvent.Name: window_system.actuator.CurrentSensorDamaged
BasicEvent.Description: The current sensor has been damage or is not calibrated properly and is providing an incorrect current value.

Effect.Name: Pinch Detection Malfunction
Window Did Not Stop on Fully Open or Close

BasicEvent.Name: window_system.actuator.MotorFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The motor is no longer providing current for the sensor to read and is not providing any torque.

Effect.Name: Window Does Not Move on Request
Window Does Not Move on Request
Window Does Not Move on Request

FaultTree.Name: Window Does Not Move on Request
